sentence: Without much hope I told reception about this just in case they had seen it and they told me they would check and let me know
The decoration and facilities inside the bungalow are simple and definitely not luxury one yet we enjoy its Maldivian style everything inside are well maintained and clean
As I dance on the beach and swing on a hammock I notice a discreet button on a palm tree I press it who can resist
Akram he was stationed at the gym

Unlike hotel rooms I do not think having seen a good range of accommodation here that I had go for anything above entry level beach accommodation it is just not worth the big price uplift for additional pool and outdoor space or sunset vs sunrise sides of the island when you have beach access unles you have kids perhapsBeach PolBeach is stunning service is great as KH is a smaller island than LG you have beach service everywhere even directly outside your own villa at LG you had to move to Blu beach to get service or call in room dining
The style of the KH accommodation was actually a little nicer the actual finishing and build
We went to the spa just to see the facilities and it is on a separate island
do not get me wrong the resort is great but your five star accommodation no matter how lavish could not beat the sight of manta rays or scorpion fish hiding in the rocks
I strongly recommend FS to look into it and have the staircase type where you walk down the stairs
Really can not come up with any bad reviews about them the accommodations might be slightly on a steeper end but the quality deserves it
I was a most special experience of high quality food ambience accommodation and most of all people
We just felt at home everywhere we went met by smiles and greetings by everyone at the reception recreation centre resort shop jetty and on our way around the resort
Amazingly friendly staff beautiful accommodations great food and a gorgeous setting
The bungalow was magnificent and the over water villa and pavilion had full private pool with full privacy beautify maintain with high quality amenities
The water sports facilities and trips are also incredible

So I have to recommend Randy as the MD loved his Hawaiian shirts who always reacts personally to all reviews Maxime as the Spa manager but who seemed to have a very broad role also great dance moves Aditya who as FB manager was always around and never seemed to have an hour off Azu who was an extremely flexible and friendly reception manager and Moustafa a great chef

Kuda Hura resort lives up to the Four Seasons ’ standards and reputation in every way all staff are friendly welcoming and helpful accommodation is comfortable well appointed and well maintained the restaurants and bars are inventive and varied as well as providing excellent food and drinks recreational facilities are plentiful well organised and with good well maintained equipment the spa and wellness activities are excellent
The equipment is in excellent condition and the staff is well trained and knows the area and risks well
4 restaurants adjacent to each other near Reception easily accessible
Beyond the physical amenities and the incredible gastronomy of this resort what makes it truly special is the staff
